All.char_sdesc: Thiva is the little brother of Dimitri.
All.char_ldesc:
He was innately talented and played music throughout his childhood.
He really wants to help the world and improve people's lives but believes the best way to do that is to reach the individual with a true message through his music.
All.char_ability_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 5%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 15 HP in 5s.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 8%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 20 HP in 5s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 11%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 25 HP in 5s.
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 14%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 30 HP in 5s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 17%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 35 HP in 5s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Rescue (help-up) speed increases by 20%. Upon a successful rescue, user recovers 40 HP in 5s.

All.char_sdesc: Dimitri is the elder brother of Thiva.
All.char_ldesc:
In his daily life, he would spend most of his day at the lab developing new sound technology.
After he found his passion for music, he realized that helping the world and improving people's lives moving forward through his technological creations might be one of his dreams.
All.char_ability_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 10s, CD 85s.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 11s, CD 80s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 12s, CD 75s.
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 13s, CD 70s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 14s, CD 65s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Creates a 3.5m healing zone. Inside, users and allies recover 3HP/s. When downed, users and allies can self-recover to get up. Lasts for 15s, CD 60s.

All.char_sdesc: D-bee has an extrovert personality and very enjoy to meet new poeple.
All.char_ldesc: He believes that the meaning of lives is creating, and that's the reason why he become a creator. He is also fascinated by dancing and music.
All.char_ability_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed and accuracy increase.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 5%, accuracy increases by 10%
All.char_ability_l2_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 7%, accuracy increases by 13%
All.char_ability_l3_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 9%, accuracy increases by 17%. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 11%, accuracy increases by 22%
All.char_ability_l5_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 13%, accuracy increases by 28%
All.char_ability_l6_desc: When firing while moving, movement speed increases by 15%, accuracy increases by 35%.

All.char_sdesc: Maro prefers the company of animals over humans.
All.char_ldesc: He feels humans often overthink everything and forget about the true meaning of life. He wants to be a free spirit and hopes that he can also help bring other humans closer to nature through his birds.
All.char_ability_desc: Damage increases with distance. Damage to marked enemies increases.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 5%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 1%
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 7%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 1.5%
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 10%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 2%. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 14%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 2.5%
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 19%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 3%
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Damage increases with distance, up to 25%. Damage to marked enemies increases by 3.5%.

All.char_sdesc: Xayne was always interested in more extreme activities even when she was a kid.
All.char_ldesc: She prefers the adrenaline rush of xtreme sports instead of human interaction. Free-spirit, she wants to explore life and find its limits. If someone says ''you can't do something'', she will definitely find a way to do it.
All.char_ability_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 40% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 150s.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 50% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 140s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 61% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 130s.
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 73% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 120s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 86% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 110s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Gets 80 HP temporarily, 100% increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields. Lasts for 10s. Cooldown: 100s.

All.char_sdesc: Skyler got his rise to fame as the hottest pop singer-dancer in the country.
All.char_ldesc: Driven to be the best musical talent in the business and to also find the best talent. He doesn't like to lose and believes that creativity allows people to see the good in the world instead of the bad.
All.char_ability_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages Gloo Walls. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 50m. CD 60s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 4 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 58m. CD 58s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 5 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 67m. CD 55s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 6 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 77m. CD 51s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 7 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 88m. CD 46s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 8 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Unleash a sonic wave forward that damages 5 Gloo Walls within 100m. CD 40s. Also, each Gloo Wall deployed will result in 9 HP recovery. Recovery effects do not stack. Skyler's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Fights have been a part of Shirou’s life since he was a child.
All.char_ldesc: As an app-delivery boy. Receive, transport, deliver ... no questions asked: he only does what is necessary to reach the demand for deliveries and withdrawals. When he's not in transit, Shirou uses his free time to train at the Wukong Fight Academy.
All.char_ability_desc: When user is hit from within 80m, the attacker is marked (only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has additional armor penetration.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 50% additional armor penetration, CD 25s.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 58% additional armor penetration, CD 24s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 67% additional armor penetration, CD 22s. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 77% additional armor penetration, CD 19s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 88% additional armor penetration, CD 15s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: When user is hit by enemy from within 80m, said attacker is marked for 6s (marking only visible to user). First shot on marked enemies has 100% additional armor penetration, CD 10s. Shirou's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Chrono comes from a parallel universe where there is a higher science and technological level than the levels in our current world Earth.
All.char_ldesc: He had a normal childhood in his original universe. His parents were famous lawyers who fought against poverty and to help bring the poor homeless people up into society.
All.char_ability_desc: Creates a force field that blocks damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase in movement speed during activation.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 5% in movement speed during 3s activation. CD 250s.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 6% in movement speed during 3s activation. CD 242s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 7% in movement speed during 4s activation. CD 235s.Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 8% in movement speed during 4s activation. CD 229s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 9% in movement speed during 5s activation. CD 224s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Creates a force field that blocks 600 damages from enemies. One can fire from inside the force field. Within the force field, you can increase 10% in movement speed during 5s activation. CD 220s. Chrono's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Dasha was a very happy and productive child.
All.char_ldesc: Her parents died, her best friend moved away, her foster family was terrible to her and her country was on the brink of war. She felt betrayed, mistreated and abused by people and the system.

All.char_ability_l3_desc: Reduce damage taken from falls by 35%. Reduce recover time from falls by 65%. Reduce rate of recoil buildup by 7%. Reduce maximum recoil by 7%.
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Reduce damage taken from falls by 39%. Reduce recover time from falls by 69%. Reduce rate of recoil buildup by 7.8%. Reduce maximum recoil by 7.8%.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Reduce damage taken from falls by 44%. Reduce recover time from falls by 74%. Reduce rate of recoil buildup by 8.8%. Reduce maximum recoil by 8.8%.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Reduce damage taken from falls by 50%. Reduce recover time from falls by 80%. Reduce rate of recoil buildup by 10%. Reduce maximum recoil by 10%.

All.char_sdesc: K was a smart kid, but like most kids his age he didn’t take school seriously.
All.char_ldesc: When he was 16, still a junior in high school, he got into a car crash and injured his spine. His doctors told him he would never walk again. But he refused to give up - this would not be the end for him.
All.char_ability_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every {4}s, up to {6} EP. Mode switch CD 3s.

All.char_ability_l2_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every 2.8s, up to 110 EP. Mode switch CD 3s.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every 2.6s, up to 120 EP. Mode switch CD 3s. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every 2.4s, up to 130 EP. Mode switch CD: 3s.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every 2.2s, up to 140 EP. Mode switch CD 3s.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Max EP increases by 50. Jiujitsu Mode: Allies within 6m get 500% increase in EP conversion rate. Psychology Mode: Recover 2 EP every 2s, up to 150 EP. Mode switch CD 3s. K's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Luqueta was an exchange student from overseas.
All.char_ldesc: He moved because of his dad's job.His dad wanted him to follow in his footsteps and get an MBA and get into business. But Luqueta saw his dad's life and didn't want any of that. He was always an atheletic kid.
All.char_ability_desc: Every kill increase the max HP, up to 35.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 10, up to 50.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 13, up to 50.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 16, up to 50. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 19, up to 50.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 22, up to 50.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Every kill increase the max HP by 25, up to 50. Luqueta's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Kelly is a high-school sprinter.
All.char_ldesc:
She is also known as Shimada Kiriko.
She loves to run, and can always be seen on the track.
Running forward is built into her mind and body. No matter the obstacle, she will always push forward.
All.char_ability_desc: Increase sprinting speed.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 1%.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 2%.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 3%. Unlocks Training Set
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 4%.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 5%.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Sprinting speed increased by 6%. Kelly's Achievement

All.char_sdesc: Hayato, a kid from a legendary Samurai family.
All.char_ldesc:
Being the only child means that Hayato needs to carry on the family tradition and curse...
This young Samurai has a secret nobody else can know...
All.char_ability_desc: The lower your HP, the higher your armor penetration becomes.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 7.5% armor penetration.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 8.0% armor penetration.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 8.5% armor penetration. First of Flame
All.char_ability_l4_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 9.0% armor penetration.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 9.5% armor penetration.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: When maximum HP is decreased by 10%, increase 10.0% armor penetration. Life of Hayato

All.char_sdesc: Moco, the legend of the Cyber World.
All.char_ldesc:
Moco is also known as "chat noir" for her skill and intelligence.
She can hack into any computer she wants without anyone noticing. After she gets the information she needs, she disappears like a ghost.
All.char_ability_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for a few seconds.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 2 seconds.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 2.5 seconds.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 3 seconds. Moco's Hacker Jacket
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 3.5 seconds.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 4 seconds.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Tag the enemies that Moco shot for 5 seconds. Banner Moco

All.char_sdesc: Steffie is a liberalist. Since childhood, she has already shown the surprising gift for art.
All.char_ldesc: After the war, Steffie saw the rise of Future Horizons in her country and how they huntered down artists in the name of a better future. She became a famous rebel, leaving amazing graffiti in the city to laugh at their cowardice.
All.char_ability_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage and bullet damage by 5% for some seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 15% and bullet damage by 5% for 5 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 17% and bullet damage by 5% for 6 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 19% and bullet damage by 5% for 7 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack. Summon airdrop playcard
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 21% and bullet damage by 5% for 8 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 23% and bullet damage by 5% for 9 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Create a graffiti that reduces explosive damage by 25% and bullet damage by 5% for 10 seconds. CD 45s. Effects do not stack. Steffie's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Misha is an extremely talented racer.
All.char_ldesc:
Her never-say-die attitude and insane driving skills earned her the title of Racequeen from the racing community.
Always the one to tackle challenges head on, she rose rapidly to fame as she competed in more tournaments.
All.char_ability_desc: Increase driving speed and reduce damage taken while inside vehicles. Harder to be targeted at while driving.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Driving speed increased by 5%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 5%. Harder to be targeted at while driving.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Driving speed increased by 6%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 8%. Harder to be targeted at while driving.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Driving speed increased by 8%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 12%. Harder to be targeted at while driving. Misha's Racequeen Set.
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Driving speed increased by 11%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 17%. Harder to be targeted at while driving.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Driving speed increased by 15%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 23%. Harder to be targeted at while driving.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Driving speed increased by 20%, damage taken while in a vehicle decreased by 30%. Harder to be targeted at while driving. Misha's Achievement

All.char_sdesc: Maxim loves to livestream while he eats.
All.char_ldesc:
With a humongous appetite, he never says no to food.
He has won several speed eating competitions, even if he goes against people who are much bigger than him.
All.char_ability_desc: Reduce time for eating mushrooms and using med kits.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Reduces the time for eating mushrooms and using med kits by 15%.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Reduces the time for eating mushrooms and using med kits by 18%.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Reduces the time for eating mushrooms and using med kits by 22%. Maxim's Foodie Jacket.

All.char_ability_l5_desc: Reduces the time for eating mushrooms and using med kits by 33%.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Reduces the time for eating mushrooms and using med kits by 40%. Maxim's Achievement

All.char_sdesc: Andrew was a police officer. With his strong sense of justice, he spent most of his time chasing criminals.
All.char_ldesc:
His singlet was his lucky charm, he had already lost count of the number of fights he survived wearing it.
Searching for the truth behind everything was his call of duty.
All.char_ability_desc: Decrease vest durability loss.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 2%.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 4%.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 6%. Unlocks Alternative Police Set
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 8%.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 10%.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Vest durability loss decreased by 12%. Andrew's Achievement

All.char_sdesc: Caroline, a girl who grew up in an extremely wealthy family.
All.char_ldesc:
She is always surrounded by bodyguards wherever she goes.
She has enough fans to fill up an entire stadium. She is no doubt the most popular girl at school.
All.char_ability_desc: Increased movement speed when holding a shotgun.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 3%.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 4%.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 5%. Caroline's Fan Club Jacket
All.char_ability_l4_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 6%.
All.char_ability_l5_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 7%.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: When holding a shotgun, movement speed is increased by 8%. Caroline's Grace

All.char_sdesc: Laura is an outstanding special agent.
All.char_ldesc:
She has been a talented shooter ever since she was a kid.
Laura wants to bring justice to the world.
All.char_ability_desc: Accuracy increased while scoped in.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Accuracy increased by 10% while scoped in.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Accuracy increased by 13% while scoped in.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Accuracy increased by 17% while scoped in. Agent's Windbreaker
All.char_ability_l4_desc: Accuracy increased by 22% while scoped in.

All.char_sdesc: Rafael is a deadly killer.
All.char_ldesc: His goal is to bring justice to the world.
All.char_ability_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer faster HP loss.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer 20% faster HP loss.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer 23% faster HP loss.
All.char_ability_l3_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer 27% faster HP loss. Gunman Jacket

All.char_ability_l5_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer 38% faster HP loss.
All.char_ability_l6_desc: Silencing effect when using snipers and marksman rifles. Enemies hit and downed suffer 45% faster HP loss. Deadly Killer

All.char_sdesc:
Using the power of music, Alok left Brazil and travelled the world.
His name means “light”.
All.char_ldesc: He has signed a contract and a closed concert will happen on Free Fire’s battleground island for some VIP guests!
All.char_ability_desc: Create a 5m aura that increase moving and sprinting speed and restore HP. Effect cannot be stacked.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Create an 5m aura that increase moving and sprinting speed by10% and restore 5 HP for 5 seconds. CD 45s. Effect cannot be stacked.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: Create an 5m aura that increase moving and sprinting speed by11% and restore 5 HP for 6 seconds. CD 45s. Effect cannot be stacked.

All.char_ability_l6_desc: Create an 5m aura that increase moving and sprinting speed by15% and restore 5 HP/s for 10 seconds. CD 45s. Effect cannot be stacked. Alok's Banner

All.char_sdesc: Jota grew up in a middle class family, was an average student and had a family who loved him.
All.char_ldesc: Overall, a pretty normal life - but he felt trapped and needed more action in his life. He lived in a city with skyscrapers that filled the skyline and felt trapped, so he started climbing to find places to see the sky.
All.char_ability_desc: When using guns, hitting an enemy recovers some HP for the user.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: When using guns, hitting an enemy recovers some HP for the user, knocking down an enemy recovers 10% maximum HP for the user.
All.char_ability_l2_desc: When using guns, hitting an enemy recovers some HP for the user, knocking down an enemy recovers 12% maximum HP for the user.

All.char_ability_l6_desc: When using guns, hitting an enemy recovers some HP for the user, knocking down an enemy recovers 20% maximum HP for the user.

All.char_sdesc: Clu grew up in a suburb of a large city.
All.char_ldesc: Her parents were wealthy, never had to worry about the basics of life and she had a very loving childhood. When she was a teenager, her dad was recruited for the war effort. The war ended a year later and he never came home. He was never found. Clu became a private eye detective after graduating high school in hopes she could uncover details on her dad's disappearance
All.char_ability_desc: Locate positions of enemies who are not in prone or squat position, CD 50s. Teammates share skill effects afters level 4.
All.char_ability_l1_desc: Locate positions of enemies who are not in prone or squat position. Teammates share skill effects afters level 1.

Kla was an esteemed martial artist, specializing in Muay Thai.

The Kla that reappeared before everyone is not the same one as the famous Kla that everyone in the industry was familiar with.
He is now an avenger, and leaves no mercy to anyone.
Be careful of his fists, they will break anything and everything.

Female.char_sdesc: Olivia was a nurse. Nursing and caring for those around her brings her happiness.
Female.char_ldesc:
No matter who, friend or foe, she always gives her all in taking care of her patients.
It is said that patients saved by her healing touch, gain an inexplicable strength and confidence in life.
Female.char_ability_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get extra HP.
Female.char_ability_l1_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 30 HP.
Female.char_ability_l2_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 36 HP.
Female.char_ability_l3_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 43 HP. Unlocks Intern Set
Female.char_ability_l4_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 51 HP.
Female.char_ability_l5_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 60 HP.
Female.char_ability_l6_desc: Players revived by Olivia will get up with extra 70 HP. Olivia's Achievement

Female.char_sdesc: Shani is a self-made engineer. Her parents were killed in a building explosion when she was 18 and she lost everything she had.
Female.char_ldesc:
She wandered around for a few years doing odd jobs to make a living, when a junkyard owner took her in and gave her a place to call home.
There she was able to work with junk parts and engineer to her hearts' content.
Female.char_ability_desc: Restore armor durability after every kill. Extra durability can upgrade your armor, up to level 3.
